{"step_by_step_thinking": "Light cure systems are used in dentistry for curing resins. They emit a strong light, usually in the blue spectrum. The most common side effect of exposure to this type of light without proper eye protection is retinal damage, as the retina is very sensitive to light. Iritis, cataract, and conjunctivitis are not typically associated with exposure to light cure systems.", "answer_choice": "D"}
